wikipedia_page.main: Roger Sidney Goody  (born 17 April 1944, in Northampton) is an English biochemist who served as director at the Max Planck Institute for Molecular Physiology in Dortmund from 1993 until 2013. Since 2013 he is Emeritus Director of the institute.

response: *Prof Roger S. Goody FRS, Biochemist, Director Emeritus, Max Planck Institute of Molecular Physiology, Dortmund, Germany and President of the German Society for Biochemistry and molecular Biology (2013–15)
| 2015	|| Russell G. Foster, University of Oxford	|| Roger S. Goody, Max Planck Institute for Molecular Physiology
